title: Basic html date input test
description: A basic html date input test.

narrator.edge: unable to change the value without using the date picker widget

chrome.output: input was not focused
input was not flagged with a number
unable to get to the control
input was not recognized
"12, date time, edit"
chrome.notes: each part of the date (month, day, and year) is rendered as its own tab stop and control

results.notes: implied by reading order

chrome.output: "Enter a date, Date Time Edit, 2012-12-12. Month Enter a date, edit spin box, 12. To set the value use the Arrow keys or type the value."

results.notes: for example, if you enter "1" into the month field, "1" is announced followed by "01"

chrome.output: embedded controls and grid were accessible.

history.message: Added Narrator results for NVDA and JAWS, updated NVDA+Chrome results.
